### ⚠️ Requires [Epoli](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action On Trigger

---

_Power Type_

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/powertypes/action_on_trigger) when the player uses the `/trigger` command.

Type ID: `epoli:action_on_trigger`

---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "epoli:action_on_trigger",
    "entity_action": {
        "type": "origins:execute_command",
        "command": "say Triggered :)"
    },
	"objective": "origintrigger",
	"operation": ["add", "set"],
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 5
}
```
This example will execute the command `Triggered :)` on the player when they use the trigger command for the objective `origintrigger` and using either `add` or `set` with a value of `5` or above.

Power Type

Executes an Entity Action Type when the player uses the /trigger command.

Type ID: epoli:action_on_trigger

Fields

Field Type Default Description

compare_to Integer 0 The value to compare the value of the power that will be evaluated to.
